author: Teertha
title: Need guide for Sandhan Valley from Samrad Village
text: India Mike » India Travel » States in India » Maharashtra » Need guide for Sandhan Valley from Samrad Village Need guide for Sandhan Valley from Samrad Village # 1 Hello, I need a guide for Sandhan Valley trek from Samrad Village. Can anyone recommend one who would also have the necessary equipment (ropes)? I will be visiting this weekend. In case anyone has visited recently, a trip report would be great! Thanks!
